explains: n. 强烈抗议；大声疾呼；尖叫；倒彩

sentences.en: The new tax provoked a public outcry.
sentences.cn: 新税项引起了公众的强烈抗议。

sentences.en: The killing caused an international outcry.
sentences.cn: 该起谋杀引起了国际上强烈的抗议。

sentences.en: The culling of seal cubs has led to an outcry from environmental groups.
sentences.cn: 宰杀海豹幼仔的行为已引起了环保团体的强烈抗议。
